page.title: 16 Family Life
page.content: Helen Paul Patricia Bryan (11) (12) (30-35) (40-45) Monday morning and Patricia is first up.The time is 6.00am.Patricia goes to wake Paul up because he goes to school in Canterbury and has to catch the 8.00am bus. Paul gets dressed while Patricia cooks his breakfast.At 7.30am she wakes Helen up.At 7.40am Paul leaves.5 minutes later Helen gets up, gets dressed, and has her breakfast. Patricia takes Helen to school in the car at 8.45am.When Patricia gets home Bryan gives her a cup of tea. He is working at home today but sometimes he works in the London area,and sometimes he travels around.He sells things to hospitals. Bryan meets Helen from school and takes her home in the car at 3.15pm. Paul gets home at about 4.20pm They have tea at about 5.30pm. It varies what time they go to bed.
